Name: The Leavenworth
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This great cocktail is dramatically influenced by the style of rum used. Francesco's original recipe calls for English Harbour rum.
History: Created in 2008 by Francesco Lafranconi of Southern Wine & Spirits, USA.
